summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2926, for the improvement of 6th Avenue Northwest; from West 65th street to West 85th Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, by constructing sewers and side sewers therein of proper dimensions and materials together with all appurtenances necessary for the proper sewerage and drainage of said district, under Ordinance No. 35370 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
